name: Mr. Longarm Telescoping Roller Handle with Medium Nap Roller Cover
description: The Mr. Longarm 35-1/2 in. Tele-Roller Handle with Cover features coated steel construction and comes with a 9 in. medium nap roller cover with a 3/8 in. nap. The handle provides reach of up to 9 ft. without using a ladder and telescopes from 2 ft. to 4 ft.Coated steel constructionLightweightHandle telescopes from 2 ft. to 4 ft. and locks in place with the Twist-Lok locking deviceProvides reach of up to 9 ft. without using a ladderUse for painting single story areas and working in tight spaces such as halls and closetsHelps reduce back strain9 in. medium nap roller cover included (3/8 in. nap)Click here to learn more about roller covers
